/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is flanked by lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A stone wall runs parallel to the sidewalk, adding a touch of rustic charm to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire landscape. In the distance, majestic mountains rise against the horizon, their peaks shrouded in mist. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, taking in the beauty of the day.
